citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the required program of veterinary care and contingency plan
were not available for review and examination by the APHIS official.
The licensee was not able to access the records, as the facility is preparing to relocate. During this process, no regulated
animals have been acquired or dispositioned.
Review of paperwork at a facility ensures they are operating as intended to ensure the welfare of the animals used and
housed by the facility. The facility shall ensure that records required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and the regulations
are available for APHIS officials to review on all inspections.
Correct by December 1, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection, the required program of veterinary care and contingency plan 
were not available for review and examination by the APHIS official.  
 
The licensee was not able to access the records, as the facility is preparing to relocate. During this process, no regulated 
animals have been acquired or dispositioned.  
Review of paperwork at a facility ensures they are operating as intended to ensure the welfare of the animals used and 
housed by the facility. The facility shall ensure that records required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) and the regulations 
are available for APHIS officials to review on all inspections. 
Correct by December 1, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
